1.title: Touch of Punishment
1.desc: Attacks an enemy and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

2.title: Wild Blow
2.desc: Attacks an enemy to inflict damage that increases according to your Defense and recovers 30% of the inflicted damage as HP. In addition, when used in Beast Form, the damage you inflict will be increased by 20% and then transforms into Druid Form. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Wild Cure
3.desc: Recovers HP of all allies by 30%. In addition, when used in Druid Form, increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 15% and then transforms into Beast Form to Provoke all enemies for 1 turn with a 50% chance. (Reusable in 5 turns).

4.title: Druid's Wit (Passive)
4.desc: Increases your Attack Bar by 100% if an ally's HP falls below 30% from an attack. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Fire!
1.desc: Attacks the enemy 3 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the Attack Bar by 30%.

2.title: Wild Shot!
2.desc: Attacks random enemies 8 times. Each attack has a 50% chance to weaken their Defense for 2 turns. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Fatal Extinctive Bullet
3.desc: Attacks the enemy with a cannon gun and removes all beneficial effects granted on the target. Afterwards, inflicts damage on all enemies and decreases their Attack Bar by 70%. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Windy Cut
1.desc: Cuts the enemy with a sharp blade and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 30% chance.

2.title: Twister
2.desc: Attacks all enemies with a twister to inflict damage that's proportionate to your MAX HP and recovers the HP of all allies by 25% each. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Force Field
3.desc: Creates a shield that's proportionate to 20% of your HP on all allies for 3 turns and decreases the chance of being attacked with a critical hit of the allies. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Strafe
1.desc: Rapidly fires 2 shots, and may fire an additional shot by chance. The chance of firing an additional shot is equivalent to your Critical Rate. Each attack has a 30% chance to disturb the enemy's HP recovery by 1 turn.

2.title: Arrow Storm
2.desc: Attacks random enemies for 4 times. Each attack has a 75% chance to deal Continuous Damage for 1 turn. Decreases the cooldown time of [Arrow Storm] by 1 turn whenever you attack an enemy under Continuous Damage. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Path of the Forest
3.desc: Increases the Attack Speed and Critical Rate of all allies for 3 turns. (Reusable in 6 turns).

1.title: Penalty
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with an axe to inflict 2 Continuous Damage effects for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

2.title: Wrathful Attack
2.desc: Attacks an enemy with a wrathful axe, leaving a Branding Effect for 2 turns, and increasing your Attack Bar by 50%. The target with the Branding Effect will receive 25% increased damage. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Confiscate
3.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times, with each strike having a 75% chance to steal 1 beneficial effect from the enemy. Absorbs the Attack Bar by 50% each if you attack the enemy with no beneficial effects. When this attack is on cool down, your Attack Speed increases and you recover 10% HP every turn. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Gust
1.desc: Attacks the enemy 3 times with a whirling gust of wind. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 20% chance.

2.title: Purify
2.desc: Removes all harmful effects on the target ally and recovers its HP. The recovery amount is proportionate to the Attack Power. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Spirit's Wrath
3.desc: Attacks the enemy with the spirit's power. Damage is increased by 30% for each harmful effect on the enemy. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Uppercut
1.desc: Strikes and provokes the enemy for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

2.title: Strike
2.desc: Slams the enemy to deal damage. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Crushing Power (Passive)
3.desc: Recovers all allies by 20% of my MAX HP if you get a critical hit when you attack on your turn. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Mega Smash
1.desc: Attacks with magical powers and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to Attack Speed.

2.title: Super Crush
2.desc: Attacks all enemies and stuns them with a 30% chance. The damage is proportionate to my MAX HP. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Mach Crush
3.desc: Attacks all enemies with powerful magical energy. The damage increases by 30% for each harmful effect on the enemies. The damage increases by 50% if there's only one harmful effect on the enemies. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Dreamy Invitation
1.desc: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Puts the target to Sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Recovers the Attack Bar by 50% if the enemy falls asleep after the attack.

2.title: Twisted Joy
2.desc: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Replaces up to 3 beneficial effects granted on the target with Sleep, Increased chances of landing a Glancing Hit, and Decrease DEF Effects for 2 turns each. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Brutal End
3.desc: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Attacks all enemies and disturbs the HP recovery for 2 turns. If the enemy is under Sleep, destroys the enemy's MAX HP by 50% of the damage dealt. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Sword of Promise
1.desc: Attacks with a sword. [Seal of Light] is automatically activated if the enemy dies.

2.title: Seal of Light
2.desc: Attacks the enemy to deal damage proportionate to the MAX HP and Silences the enemy for 2 turns. The enemy under the Silence Effect won't be able to use skills with cooldown time excluding the passive skills. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: God's Shield (Passive)
3.desc: Calls upon the power of the divine shield, gaining immunity against all harmful effects. Additionally, the chance of allies receiving a Critical Hit is reduced by 30%. The effect is not accumulated with other critical hit reduction effects. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Dark Horn
1.desc: Attacks and Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 25% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP.

2.title: Nature's Protection
2.desc: Creates a shield that's 30% of your MAX HP for 3 turns and creates a shield that's 20% of your MAX HP on all other allies for 2 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Other Side of the Moon (Passive)
3.desc: Reflects 30% of the received damage back to the enemy. [Automatic Effect]

4.title: Transformation: Human Form
4.desc: Transforms into a Human Form and you'll be able to use a new skill. The Attack Power will be increased proportionate to your MAX HP in Human Form, but your MAX HP will be decreased by 50%. Instantly gains another turn after the transformation. (Reusable in 2 turns).

1.title: Essence Explosion
1.desc: Attacks the enemy to inflict damage and weakens the Defense for 2 turns with a 30% chance.

2.title: Storm of Midnight
2.desc: Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm. The damage increases proportionate to the enemy's attack speed. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Frost Rush
3.desc: Attacks all enemies with ice pillars 3 times and freezes them for 1 turn with a 15% chance on each strike. Gains another turn instantly if the enemy dies. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Slash Rocks
1.desc: Swings a giant sword to deal damage and decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns with a 40% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.

2.title: Taunting Strike
2.desc: Attacks an enemy with a humiliating strike, provoking the target with an 80% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Strong Will (Passive)
3.desc: When your HP is lower than 30%, the damage you receive is reduced by 50%. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Pierce Soul
1.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times to decrease the Defense for 2 turns with a 30% chance each and disturbs the HP recovery.

2.title: Brand of Hell
2.desc: Attacks the enemy three times, with each attack having a 50% chance to receive a Branding effect for 2 turns. The damage increases as the enemy's HP becomes lower. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Secret of Eternal Life
3.desc: Removes all harmful effects on all allies and recovers their HP by 30% of your MAX HP. Revives all dead allies with 30% HP if there's any defeated ally but the skill cooldown will be increased by 2 turns for each revived ally. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Overpower
1.desc: Deals damage to an enemy and with a 50% chance, decreases its Attack Bar by 30%.

2.title: Desert Wind
2.desc: Attacks all enemies with winds of sand, decreasing 30% of their Attack Bar and also their Attack Speed by 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill increases accordingly to your Attack Speed. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Tip of the Spear(Passive)
3.desc: Increases your Attack Bar by 25% each time the enemy's turn ends. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Ice Horn
1.desc: Attacks the enemy and Freezes the target for 1 turn with a 25% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.

2.title: Fierce Charge
2.desc: Attacks the enemy to Provoke for 1 turn with a 75% chance and counterattacks the enemy for 2 turns whenever you're attacked. The damage increases accordingly to your MAX HP. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Protection Wings (Passive)
3.desc: Increases Defense for 2 turns when you're attacked by an enemy. This effect only activates once a turn. [Automatic Effect]

4.title: Transformation: Human Form
4.desc: Transforms into a Human Form and you'll be able to use a new skill. The Attack Speed will be increased proportionate to your MAX HP in Human Form, but your MAX HP will be decreased by 30%. Instantly gains another turn after the transformation. (Reusable in 2 turns).

1.desc: Summons a teddy bear to attack the enemy. This attack has a 25% chance to forcibly put the enemy to sleep for 1 turn. Acquires another turn if the enemy falls asleep.

2.title: Girl's Prayer
2.desc: Removes the harmful effects on all allies and recovers their HP. Recovery amount is proportionate to your Attack Power. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Water Guardian Angel
3.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each attack has a 40% chance to decrease the target's Defense for 3 turns and attack speed for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Thunder Smash
1.desc: Attacks an enemy with a strong smashing blow. On Critical Hit, this attack will increase your Attack Bar by 30%.

2.title: Hell Lightning
2.desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces their Attack Power for 2 turns with an 80% chance. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Hell Blow
3.desc: Attacks the enemy with overwhelming hatred and reduces the enemy's Attack Bar to 0. This attack always lands as a Crushing Hit regardless of the enemy's attribute. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.desc: Shoots 3 projectiles, with each projectile having a 30% chance to slow the Attack Speed for 2 turns.

2.title: Defeat Wild Dog
2.desc: Attacks the surrounding enemies 2 times and removes beneficial effects granted on the enemies with a 50% chance each. Increases your Attack Bar by 10% each when you land a Critical Hit. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Explosive Bullet
3.desc: Attacks the enemy with an explosive bullet and stuns the target with a 50% chance. Afterwards, attacks all enemies and stuns them with a 50% chance. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Soul Summoning
1.desc: Summons the souls of the dead to attack the enemy 2 - 3 times. Each attack has a 40% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns.

2.title: Sinkhole
2.desc: Inflicts damage to all enemies with a hole that consumes souls and recovers by 50% of the inflicted damage. Absorbs the enemy's Attack Bar by 15% with a 25% chance for each attack. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Transcendance (Passive)
3.desc: Gains a turn with a 15% chance whenever an enemy's turn ends. If this effect doesn't activate, the activation chance will be increased. If this effect is activated, the increased activation chance will be reset and your Attack Power and Critical Rate will be increased for 1 turn. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Lunging Wave
1.desc: Performs a lunge attack that damages an enemy while increasing your Critical Rate for 1 turn.

2.title: Drive
2.desc: Attacks an enemy target, decreasing its Attack Power and Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: The Smell of Blood(Passive)
3.desc: When landing as a Critical Hit, this attack additionally inflicts Continuous Damage for 1 turn on the target. If the target dies from this attack, you will heal as much as the amount of damage dealt as the finishing blow. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Run Run
1.desc: Bounces towards the enemy to attack and gets another turn with a 30% chance.

2.title: Fever Time
2.desc: Increases the Attack Power and critical rate of all allies for 2 turns. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Unexpected Exposure
3.desc: Attacks all enemies and removes beneficial effects of the enemies. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Will-o'-the-Wisp
1.desc: Attacks an enemy 3 times with a shimmering light. Each strike has a 15% chance of increasing the enemy's chance of landing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

2.title: Soul Snatcher
2.desc: Throws soul beads at the enemy to deal damage, and recovers the same amount of the inflicted damage as HP. Additionally, all excessive HP recovery from this skill will be converted into a shield that lasts for 2 turns. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Sweet Talk
3.desc: Attacks the enemy and decreases the Attack Speed, Attack Power, and Defense for 2 turns. The damage dealt to enemies under harmful effects will be increased by 50%. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Magic Arrow
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with a magical arrow which casts various harmful effects according to the attribute relation between you and the enemy. The damage of this effect increases by 15% for each harmful effect on the enemy.

2.title: Light Arrow
2.desc: Attacks with an arrow that's lightning fast. The damage increases according to Attack Speed. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Keenness (Passive)
3.desc: Your Critical Rate is increased by 25%, and your Critical Damage increases accordingly to how much HP you've lost. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Vampire Bat
1.desc: Attacks 2 times with a vampire bat and recovers HP by 30% of the inflicted damage.

2.title: Weaken
2.desc: Attacks and weakens the enemy's Attack Power and decreases the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 75% chance. The target won't be granted with beneficial effects for 2 turns with a 75% chance. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Death Blow
3.desc: Deals a fatal blow to one enemy. The damage increases by 25% for each harmful effect on the enemy. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.desc: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Puts the target to Sleep for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Recovers the Attack Bar by 50% if the enemy falls asleep after the attack.

3.title: Curse of White Night
3.desc: Attacks without waking up the enemy that's under Sleep. Reduces the Attack Speed of all enemies for 2 turns and increases the enemy's chances of landing a Glancing Hit. (Reusable in 6 turns).

1.title: Heavenly Sword
1.desc: Attacks with a heavenly sword, removing a beneficial effect on the enemy with a 75% chance. The damage increases according to your Defense.

2.title: Archangel's Blessing
2.desc: Recovers an ally's HP by 50%. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Holy Water
3.desc: Fills up the Attack Bar of all allies by 20% each and recovers their HP by 40% each. Additionally, recovers 15% HP each turn for 3 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Slash Hook
1.desc: Attacks an enemy 2 times with fast punches. Each punch has a 50% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 1 turn.

2.title: Heavy Slash
2.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 30% chance for each attack. This attack will deal more damage according to your Defense. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Silent Rage(Passive)
3.desc: Counterattacks with a 50% chance when an ally is attacked. [Automatic Effect]

1.desc: Unleashes a fatal blow on an enemy, disturbing the target's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

2.title: Deadly Wave
2.desc: Inflicts damage proportionate to your HP to all enemies and weakens their Attack Power for 2 turns with a 75% chance on each target. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Extortion
3.desc: Drains life from a targeted enemy. The stolen HP is equivalent to 30% of your MAX HP. Also disturbs the target's HP recovery for 2 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.desc: Attacks with a heavenly sword, removing a beneficial effect on the enemy with a 75% chance. The damage increases according to your Defense.

2.title: Archangel's Blessing
2.desc: Recovers an ally's HP by 50%. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Judge (Passive)
3.desc: Counterattacks instantly when you or an ally is attacked with a critical hit and increases your Attack Bar by 10%. Increases your Defense by 10% each whenever [Judge (Passive)] is activated. (Accumulates up to 10 times) [Automatic Effect]

1.desc: Throws a small spirit at the enemy and increases your Critical Rate by 30% at next turn if you get a Critical Hit.

2.title: Turbulence

3.desc: Your Attack Speed increases as your HP gets lower, and you deal 50% more damage if the enemy has more HP than you. [Automatic Effect]

1.desc: Attacks an enemy with a small flame and decreases the Attack Power for 2 turns if the attack lands as a Critical Hit.

1.desc: Attacks the enemy and steals one beneficial effect with a 50% chance.

2.desc: The XP granted will additionally increase by 50% when used as Power-up material for Monsters with the same attribute.

Boomerang Warrior's attacks will also inflict additional damage that's proportionate to the enemy's MAX HP when they attack together. [Automatic Effect]

2.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack, removing 1 beneficial effect and sets back the target's skills to MAX cooldown. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 25% chance to increase the enemy's chance of dealing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

2.desc: Removes all harmful effects on an ally target and fills up the ally's Attack Bar. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Lock Down

1.desc: Charges towards the enemy to inflict damage and provokes for 1 turn with a 50% chance.

2.title: Battle Stomp
2.desc: Stomps on all enemies and decreases the Attack Bar by 25% for each target with a 50% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.desc: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 40% and removes all harmful effects. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Stone Claws
1.desc: Attacks the enemy to inflict damage that increases according to your Defense and increases your Defense by 30%. (Accumulates up to 5 times)

2.title: Destructive Claws
2.desc: Inflicts damage on the enemy in proportion to your Defense and destroys the target's HP by the amount of damage dealt. Afterwards, you will be turned into a statue until the next turn starts. While you are a statue, you won't be able to move. But you will gain immunity against inability effects, receive 30% less damage and recover your HP by 10% until the statue state is gone. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.desc: When your turn ends, you will be turned into a statue until the next turn starts with a 30% chance. You can't get defeated when you are turned into a statue. [Automatic Effect]

3.desc: Reduces the odds of receiving a Critical Hit by 50% and increases your Resistance by 50%. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Preemptive Strike
1.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 25% chance to increase the enemy's chance of dealing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

2.desc: Attacks an enemy and then removes all beneficial effects on the target. If there are 2 or more beneficial effects removed, the Attack Bar of all allies will be increased by 20% each. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.desc: A randomly selected ally also attacks when you attack during your turn. [Automatic Effect]

1.desc: Rolls 2 dice to attack the enemy target 2 times and grants an effect according to each number you get for 2 turns as follows; 4: Unrecoverable, 5: Decrease DEF, 6: Increased chances of landing a Glancing Hit. Instantly gains another turn if you get the same number.

2.title: Unlucky 7
2.desc: Rolls 2 dice to attack all enemies and Stuns them for 1 turn if the sum of the numbers is greater than 7, and decreases the Attack Speed for 2 turns if the sum is less than 7. Instantly gains another turn if you get the same number. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Returned Dice
3.desc: Makes the Attack Bar of all enemies and all allies change to 0, increases the Attack Speed of all other allies except yourself for 1 turn and stuns yourself for 1 turn. This effect can't be resisted and ignores the immunity. (Reusable in 7 turns).

1.title: Fire Smash
1.desc: Attacks an enemy with a strong smashing blow. On Critical Hit, this attack will increase your Attack Bar by 30%.

2.title: Hell Fire
2.desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces their Defense for 2 turns with a 70% chance. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Meteor
3.desc: Strikes an enemy with a giant meteor, stunning the target and inflicting Continuous Damage on the rest of the enemies for 3 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Lightning Claw
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with sharp, lightning claws. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit.

2.title: Solid Blades
2.desc: Increases your Attack Power and Critical Rate for 3 turns. Additionally, your Attack Bar increases by 50%. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.desc: Inflicts a deep wound to the target, leaving 2 Continuous Damage effects for 3 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.desc: Decreases the inflicted damage by half if the damage is less than 20% of my MAX HP. [Automatic Effect]

While you are a statue, you won't be able to move. But you will gain immunity against inability effects, receive 30% less damage and recover your HP by 10% until the statue state is gone. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.desc: Increases the Attack Bars of all allies by 30%, also increasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Overpower
1.desc: Deals damage to an enemy and with a 50% chance, decreases its Attack Bar by 30%.

2.title: Defensive Stance
2.desc: Increases the Defense of all allies for 2 turns, and decreases the chance of them receiving Critical Hits. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Duty of the Monarch(Passive)
3.desc: Increases the other allies' Attack Bar by 10% whenever your turn ends. If the allies have beneficial effects, additionally increases the Attack Bar based on the number of beneficial effects, up to 20%. This effect does not have effect on allies that have similar skill effects. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Rolling Punch
1.desc: Throws a punch that ignores the enemy's Defense and weakens the Attack Power for 1 turn with an 80% chance.

2.title: Drunken Kick
2.desc: Kicks the enemy unsteadily. Gets drunk and attacks a random enemy with [Rolling Punch] with a 30% chance afterwards. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Snake Punch
3.desc: Attacks the enemy 3 times to grant Continuous Damage for 1 turn with each attack and increases the Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns. Gets drunk and attacks a random enemy with [Rolling Punch] with a 50% chance afterwards. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Special Ingredient (Passive)
1.desc: The XP granted when used as Power-up material, greatly increases according to the monster's level. The XP amount also increases through Awakening.

2.title: Best Ingredient (Passive)
2.desc: The XP granted will additionally increase by 50% when used as Power-up material for Monsters with the same attribute.

1.title: Special Material (Passive)
1.desc: Acquires 2x the EXP compared to a normal Angelmon when used for Power-ups. Awaken to get even more EXP.

2.title: Best Ingredient (Passive)
2.desc: The XP granted will additionally increase by 50% when used as Power-up material for Monsters with the same attribute.

1.title: Trickster
1.desc: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your Attack Speed.

2.title: Song of the Night Wind
2.desc: Increases the Attack Speed and Critical Rate of all allies for 2 turns. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: The Shadow of the Moon (Passive)
3.desc: Gains a shield that is equivalent to 20% of your MAX HP for 1 turn when being attacked by an enemy. This effect only activates once a turn. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Graceful Touch
1.desc: Attacks with a graceful touch and possesses the enemy with a 30% chance to increase the enemy's chances to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

2.title: Amuse
2.desc: Recovers the allies and increases the Attack Power for 3 turns. The recovery power is in proportion to the Attack Power. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Dagger of Grudge
3.desc: Attacks with a secretly hidden blade to inflict damage that ignores all beneficial effects that reduce the inflicted damage. The damage also increases as your HP status decreases. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Fake Attack
1.desc: Performs an unpredictable attack and decreases the target's Attack Power for 1 turn. This attack will also increase the target's chance of landing a Glancing Hit for 1 turn if this attack lands as a Critical Hit.

2.title: Burning Desert
2.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times with a sandstorm and decreases the Attack Bar by 30% with a 30% chance for each attack. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Magic Flute
3.desc: Attacks all enemies by playing the magic flute and sets their Attack Bar to 0. (Reusable in 6 turns).

1.title: Fake Attack
1.desc: Performs an unpredictable attack and decreases the target's Attack Power for 1 turn. This attack will also increase the target's chance of landing a Glancing Hit for 1 turn if this attack lands as a Critical Hit.

2.title: Angry Wave
2.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times with waves of water. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Speed for 2 turns. If the target already suffers an Attack Speed reduction effect, this attack will stun them for 1 turn. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Secret Visit
3.desc: Stuns the enemy with the highest Attack Bar for 1 turn, removes the harmful effects on you, and recovers 15% HP. Also your Attack Speed will be increased and you will recover 15% HP per turn for 2 turns. (Reusable in 3 turns).

1.title: Yin Yang Attack
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with the power of Yin and Yang and puts the enemy to sleep for 2 turns with a 20% chance. The damage increases according to your MAX HP.

2.title: North Star's Wisdom
2.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times with each attack having a 75% chance to remove a beneficial effect of the enemy and a 75% chance to block the beneficial effects granted on the target for 2 turns. This attack won't land as Glancing Hits. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Inhale Magic
3.desc: Steals the HP of all enemies by 15% of your MAX HP and steals all beneficial effects on all enemies. Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 20% if you successfully steal beneficial effects. (Reusable in 6 turns).

1.title: Yin Yang Attack
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with the power of Yin and Yang and puts the enemy to sleep for 2 turns with a 20% chance. The damage increases according to your MAX HP.

2.title: Mountain's Power
2.desc: Attacks the enemy with the might of the mountains to inflict damage that's proportionate to your MAX HP and recovers the HP of all allies by 15% of your MAX HP. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Wish of Immortality
3.desc: Grants immunity to all allies that lasts for 3 turns and creates a shield equal to 15% of my HP. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Spear of Protector
1.desc: Attacks the enemy to decrease the Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 30% chance. The faster your Attack Speed compared to the enemy's, the greater damage you can inflict.

2.title: Fast Link
2.desc: The faster your Attack Speed, the greater the damage becomes. Attacks the enemy with the beast 2 times. The beast's attack weakens the enemy's Defense for 1 turn, and the rider's attack absorbs the enemy's Attack Bar by 25% for each harmful effect granted on the target, up to 100%. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Late Night Ambush
3.desc: Attacks all enemies with the beast 2 times. The beast's attack sets the enemies' Attack Bar to 0, and the rider's attack inflicts damage that increases up to 100% in proportion to the Attack Bar that the beast decreased. (Reusable in 6 turns).

4.title: Rider (Passive)
4.desc: Dismounts the beast to battle when you're inflicted with damage that may cause you to die. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Rolling Punch
1.desc: Throws a punch that ignores the enemy's Defense and weakens the Attack Power for 1 turn with an 80% chance.

2.title: Drunken Kick
2.desc: Kicks the enemy unsteadily. Gets drunk and attacks a random enemy with [Rolling Punch] with a 30% chance afterwards. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Tiger Punch
3.desc: Attacks the enemy 2 times and increases the Attack Power of all allies for 2 turns. Gets drunk and attacks a random enemy with [Rolling Punch] with a 50% chance afterwards. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Energy Ball
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with condensed energy and reduces the enemy's Defense for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Twist Kick will be activated in succession with a 30% chance.

2.title: Twist Kick
2.desc: Attacks the target with a turning kick and decreases its Attack Bar by 50% with an 80% chance and decreases its Attack Speed for 2 turns. If the target's Attack Bar is depleted by this attack, the target will be stunned for 1 turn. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Water Dragon Attack
3.desc: Strikes random targets 4 times with the power of water and increases the inflicted damage by 15% for each harmful effect of the enemy. If this skill is on cooldown, you have a 25% chance to counterattack when attacked. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Energy Punch
1.desc: Attacks with a spinning punch and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 30% chance.

2.title: Counterattack
2.desc: Increases the critical rate for 2 turns and counterattacks when attacked. The Attack Bar is increased by 50%, and the damage you receive will be reduced by half when you get attacked while this skill is on cooldown. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Lonely Fight (Passive)
3.desc: Absorbs the Attack Bar by 20% if you attack a monster with same or lower HP status compared to yours. Recovers your HP by 20% of the damage dealt if you attack a monster that has better HP status than yours. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Monkey Wand
1.desc: Attacks with the Monkey Wand and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 35% chance.

2.title: Lightning Monkey Wand
2.desc: Attacks and decreases the Defense for 2 turns with a 75% chance and recovers your Attack Bar by 50%. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Stone Monkey (Passive)
3.desc: Decreases the incoming damage by 35% and counterattacks with a 35% chance when an ally is attacked. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Sequential Attack
1.desc: Attacks the enemy 3 times with each strike having a 30% chance to decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns.

2.title: Calm Mind
2.desc: Removes the harmful effects casted on yourself and counterattacks for 2 turns when attacked. Recovers 15% of the HP of all allies in each turn for the next 2 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Panda Supremacy
3.desc: Attacks the enemy 4 times to grant 1 random harmful effect among Glancing Hit Rate Increase, Attack Power Decrease, and Attack Speed Decrease with a 70% chance each. The inflicted damage is proportionate to your Defense and the MAX HP of the target. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Spear Charge
1.desc: Charges towards the enemy with a spear to inflict continuous damage for 1 turn. Increases your Attack Power for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit.

2.title: Spear Pierce
2.desc: Pierces the enemy with a spear and inflicts damage proportionate to the target's MAX HP. Inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Wipe Out
3.desc: Charges towards the enemy to attack 5 times, and either inflicts continuous damage for 1 turn with a 75% chance or ignores the enemy's Defense with a 25% chance with each attack. (Reusable in 4 turns).

1.title: Swing
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with a whip, decreasing the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to Attack Speed.

2.title: Fast Swing
2.desc: Attacks the enemy 3 times in a row and absorbs the Attack Bar by 20% with each strike. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns if you attack with a critical hit. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Dancing Whip (Passive)
3.desc: Gets an extra turn with a 20% chance when your turn is over. Increases the effect activation rate by 20% each if the effect doesn't get activated. The increased rate will reset when the effect is activated. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Graceful Touch
1.desc: Attacks with a graceful touch and possesses the enemy with a 30% chance to increase the enemy's chances to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

2.title: Blade Fan
2.desc: Throws a fan to attack the enemy 3 times, with each attack having a 50% chance to remove one of the enemy's beneficial effect. Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 15% each per beneficial effect removed. The damage is proportionate to the attack speed. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Charge Vitality
3.desc: Fills up the Attack Bar of an ally target and yourself and recovers HP by 50%. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Fire Bolt
1.desc: Shoots a Fire arrow at the enemy.

2.title: Rain of Fire
2.desc: Burns enemies with a Fire shower and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 25% chance for each attack. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Fiery Breath
3.desc: Attacks all enemies with a fiery breath and puts their skills on cool down. (Reusable in 6 turns).

1.title: Returning Boomerang
1.desc: Attacks the enemy to decrease the Defense for 1 turn with a 50% chance. Additionally, if there's Chakram Dancer included in the ally team, one of Boomerang Warriors will attack together with Chakram Dancer during Chakram Dancer's turn.

2.title: Spirit Focus
2.desc: Removes all harmful effects granted on yourself and increases your Attack Power for 2 turns. You instantly gain another turn after using the skill. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Vacuum Boomerang
3.desc: Attacks the enemy to stun the target for 1 turn and increases the harmful effect granted on the enemy by 1 turn. Chakram Dancer's attack will increase the enemy's harmful effect duration by 1 turn each with a 50% chance when they attack together. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Lunging Wave
1.desc: Performs a lunge attack that damages an enemy while increasing your Critical Rate for 1 turn.

2.title: Drive
2.desc: Attacks an enemy target, decreasing its Attack Power and Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance. (Reusable in 3 turns).

3.title: Spiritism
3.desc: Calls upon the power of the sea to increase the Attack Power and Attack Speed for 3 turns. You instantly gain another turn after using this ability. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Holy Bolt
1.desc: Shoots a Light arrow at the enemy.

2.title: Holy Light
2.desc: Calls upon the holy power of light, healing all allies by 15% of their HP and also removing 2 harmful effects from each ally. Light attribute allies will receive doubled amount of healing. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Armageddon
3.desc: Redistributes the HP of all enemies, excluding the Boss, and sacrifices half of your current HP to deal damage proportionate to the sacrificed HP to all enemies. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Trample
1.desc: Pins down the enemy and inflicts Continuous Damage for 1 turn.

2.title: Unleashed Fury
2.desc: Gains increased Attack Power and Immunity against harmful effects for 3 turns. Instantly recovers a turn when used. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Forbidden Power (Passive)
3.desc: Inflicts up to 2 extra attacks with 50% of the damage if you get a Critical Hit. [Automatic Effect]

1.title: Firecracker
1.desc: Attacks the enemy with a bomb. The damage increases by 15% for each harmful effect on the enemy.

2.title: Multi-Firecracker
2.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times with a loud bomb. Each attack has a 25% chance to deal Continuous Damage for 2 turns and the skill cooldown time of [Multi-Firecracker] will be decreased by 1 turn each whenever the enemies are inflicted with Continuous Damage. (Reusable in 4 turns).

3.title: Meteor Bomb
3.desc: Drops a flaming bomb to randomly attack the enemies 4 times. Each attack will inflict Continuous Damage for 2 turns. Immediately sets off the bomb if the enemy has bombs. (Reusable in 5 turns).

1.title: Pulverize
1.desc: Strikes an enemy with a hammer and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 15% chance. If the target is under Defense reduction effects, its Attack Speed is decreased for 2 turns. The damage increases according to your Defense.

2.title: Spinning Smash
2.desc: Swings the hammer, attacking all enemies and decreasing their Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance. The damage increases according to your Defense. (Reusable in 5 turns).

3.title: Heap of Ashes
3.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times each, dealing damage proportionate to your Defense. Each attack has a 50% chance to reduce the target's Attack Power and block beneficial effects for 2 turns. (Reusable in 5 turns).
